title: MFM Minisode 41
description: On this week’s My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown stories from San Diego and Anaheim including a mother’s brush with almost attempted murder, a deadly magician, attempted kidnappings, and more. Plus an onstage proposal from the Balboa Theatre!
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
